content.text: Uviuy Exen was a planet located within the Shwuy sector of the Colonies.
Uviuy Exen joined the Galactic Republic early in its history, sometime between 25,000 BBY and 22,000 BBY. During the Alsakan Conflicts, it supported Alsakan.
The planet didn't secede during the Clone Wars.

During the Galactic Civil War, Uviuy Exen was a heavily-populated world that supported a well-armed Imperial Army garrison. The New Republic took control of this planet during its progression to the Core Worlds in 6 ABY. It joined the New Republic just later. Uviuy Exen was a New Republic stronghold during the Zsinj and Thrawn campaigns but was lost shotly before Operation Shadow Hand by the Imperial/Pentastar Alignment forces, in 10 ABY.
The planet was not invaded during the Yuuzhan Vong War.

elements.text: Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook
